abstract: Phoebe Nobles reviews restaurant Brick Farm Tavern in Hopewell (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: A restaurant in Hopewell, N.J., offers unusual approaches to farm-to-table ingredients, fresh from two of the partners’ nearby farm and slaughterhouse.

headline.main: Review: Brick Farm Tavern Brings in the Porcinis, Then Readies the Dirt
headline.print_headline: Out of the Ground, Onto the Plate

snippet: A restaurant in Hopewell, N.J., offers unusual approaches to farm-to-table ingredients, fresh from two of the partners’ nearby farm and slaughterhouse.
